_instructions.how_to_use: Define running condition tags for each equipment type in the cement industry
_instructions.application: Specify which equipment application this run-time tag applies to
_instructions.equipment: Optional: specific equipment name to override application-level settings
_instructions.tag: The parameter name (Comparative_tag) that indicates equipment is running
_instructions.threshold: The minimum value above which equipment is considered to be in running state (equipment is running when tag_value > threshold)
_instructions.shutdown_window_h: Optional: continuous off duration (hours) to mark SHUTDOWN
_instructions.transition_window_h: Optional: suppression window (hours) after restart before alerts resume
